# Russian Translation of the Scaling Graphic

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GiPlaatuVv8pzZff5igiuzooqXaJQVAOVi-xMXk=s96-c)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271600%27%20height=%278798%27/%3e)
![Russian Translation of the Scaling Graphic](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2Fe822f4c0-d105-4132-82ce-351648b2b945%2F&w=3840&q=75)

This is a graphic from IOG describing 11 ways that Cardano will scale in 2022. It has been translated into Russian by a Meld ambassador.

Credit: Vlad (@Malish\_Slemie on Twitter)

## 2 contributors

![](https://ucarecdn.com/4f580f1c-e076-45b2-8a8d-af75d20c0cfd/)
